entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Maui error to publish in MAC Host #5727
  • Blazor Maui project calling JS function in Razor component using generated code ExampleJsInterop fail. #5726
  • Blazor Maui project using Razor component with SkiaSharp fail #5725
  • Entry field Enter does not always move to next field #5724
  • DisplayAlert Cancel disables ToolbarItems #5723
  • Verify Blazor Hybrid scenarios on Windows in multi window apps #5722
  • [Android] Alert Dialog With Onscreen Keyboard Open Causes ScrollView Area to Cut Off #5721
  • BindableLayout.SetItemsSource for Grid and ScrollView #5719
  • [Android] Label width doesn't get updated with text #5717
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug][Shell][Windows] BackButton is not available/shown #5714
  • BlazorWebView MAUI targets don't copy item metadata for *.razor files #5713
  • Negative margin required to place content in TitleBar area when TitleBar is Hidden #5710
  • Voiceover is not reading the search result after performing search operation. #5698
    6.0.300
  • flexaligncontent.center results in a blank screen #5697
  • Add ConverterCulture property on Binding to allow overriding of culture settings #5696
    Future
  • The 'IsEnabled' and 'Color' properties of CheckBox component blocks MAUI application running on Mac #5694
  • [iOS] Calling VisualDiagnostics.RenderAs for Window causes Exception #5693
    6.0.300-rc.2

Closed

  • ApplicationVersion value does not affect Windows App #5137
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] Shadow not rendering on layouts #2857
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] Scollview scrolled event not triggered #2181
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] Bindable Layout Doesn't Update when ItemsSource Changes #1393
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] CarouselView on Android causes infinite layout loop #1882
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] [Android] CollectionView inside a VerticalStackLayout inside a Shell doesn't render any items #2865
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • File nesting with razor components and CSS files does not work in MAUI solution #5685
  • [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #5531
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Page containing CarouselView doesn't appear #5707
  • [Windows] Wrong initial cursor position in Editor #4089
    6.0.300
  • WinUI Fluent/Windows 11 eval #4236
  • border bug #5567
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Project using MultiPage migrated from Xamarin faults on MAUI #5622
  • Arm64 Can't Update to newest template #5651
  • App Icon not found error in Android app #5652
  • CheckBox not visible in Windows 11 OS dark theme #5665
  • [Bug] Building to ios-arm64 with Microsoft.Maui.Controls throws "The stream does not support seeking" #2412
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Effects does not work #2973
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] PanGestureRecognizer stops firing the PanUpdated event if the target control is removed and re-added to the container #3215
    6.0.300
  • Xml version will be in Android manifest handled as Android version code #3241
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Net6][Android] Could not activate JNI Handle exception #3296
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Visual Studio does not debug Android app with Name property on ActivityAttribute #3407
    6.0.300-servicing
  • View.Measure returns Size.zero #4880
    Future
  • ScrollView VerticalScrollBarVisibility setting stays default #5357
    6.0.300
  • ContentPresenter or View BindableProperty no preloaded view has shown. #5381
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] MAUI - iOS/Mac Localized Resx - multiple publish output files with the same relative path #1855
    6.0.300
  • Linking errors when running a maui app on physical iOS device referencing nuget packages #2179
  • [Bug] ExtendViewIntoTitleBar = true renders differently between Xamarin Forms/UWP and MAUI/WinUI3 #2190
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Unable to download dotnet-install script when behind a proxy server #3209
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ListView throws a IllegalStateException IllegalStateException #3455
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • ArgumentNullException in Resizetizer after adding svg images for splashscreen #4247
    6.0.300
  • iOS Publishing ignores bundle identifier and uses project name instead #4559
    6.0.300
  • Error HRESULT E_FAIL has been returned from a call to a COM component when Windows.Storage.Pickers is using #5443
    6.0.300
  • Essentials Email ComposeAsync Fails on WinUI with Attachment #5353
    Future
  • System.TypeLoadException - Third Party Controls #5678

PullRequests

Created

  • Add MAUI and WPF Blazor Hybrid XAML namespaces #5720
  • Wire up WindowOverlay to the Window Density #5718
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix cake #5712
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Shapes sizing issues #5709
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, high
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Correctly notify changes in the Page BackgroundColor property #5706
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Rename ApplicationId to ApplicationIdGuid for Windows #5695

Merged

  • Improve compatibility with Preview 14 #5711
    area/image :framed_picture:, t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Default Editor.VerticalTextAlignment to Start #5648
    area/controls 🎮
  • Remove BuildTools as it is part of VS #5705
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Android reduce singleline usage #5690
  • Comment out shelltests for now #5688
  • Optimize TypeConversionExtensions.ConvertTo #5655
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [android] add more methods to the AOT profile #5682
    area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix up and improve Windows dependencies #5692
    6.0.300-rc.1

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
  • [templates] add a new maui-blank template #5433
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Modal Size and fix modal touch events #5644
    area/modal, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Switch shell to using ToolbarHandler #5667
  • [C] remove Font usage from Controls #5664
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Controls] remove whitelisted Converters #5670
  • Fix Label.VerticalTextAlignment on Windows #5623
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Use fallbacks for font sizes when getting font from Span on Android #5680
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWebView public API tracking #5672
    area/blazor 🕸️
